byline.original: By JOSH KRON AND MOHAMED IBRAHIM
byline.contributor: Josh Kron reported from Nairobi, and Mohamed Ibrahim from Mogadishu, Somalia.

abstract: African Union acknowledges that its peacekeeping force in Somalia has sustained heavy casualties in its battle against the Shabab, but the precise number of peacekeepers killed remains a mystery.
snippet: The precise number of peacekeepers killed in Somalia remains something of a mystery, with Islamist militants saying they killed nearly 80 and the African Union saying 10 had been killed.
lead_paragraph: The precise number of peacekeepers killed in Somalia remains something of a mystery, with Islamist militants saying they killed nearly 80 and the African Union saying 10 had been killed.

headline.main: African Union Peacekeepers Killed in Somalia Battle
headline.print_headline: African Union Peacekeepers Killed in Somalia Battle
